Author: palish
Content: You'd probably be better off using Rails or Django right now.  Writing a web framework in Lisp is an order of magnitude harder than just using a battle tested one.

Author: brlewis
Content:
Look at the last two paragraphs of the "Blub Paradox" section of Beating the Averages:

http://www.paulgraham.com/avg.html

I think that answers your question behind the question. Then read the whole essay. It's good.\n
